KnowledgeBase.Title: Example Dictionary compareLT 004
KnowledgeBase.RelatedFunctions: compare compareEQ compareNE compareGE compareGT compareLE

Example.Description: These examples use the compareLT function to compare two Dictionaries and return the Boolean value, true or false. The corresponding keys and values of each Dictionary are compared to determine whether one Dictionary is lesser than the other.

Syntax.Note: The first Dictionary is greater than the second Dictionary.
